Articles.Content:
A good stock concept that involves flags to do a Instrument Landing System- like thing.

This is how, go to a rover, deploy it on the runway, and perfectly lined up place flags next to the runway, you will need like 10 or so, place them separetley and lined up with the runway.

How it works?

Using the tageting system, target the flags, first the farthest one from the runway, line up with it, then when you are close enough do it with the next one and so on.

This will assist you to line up with whatever runway you want, just be sure to place them centered and lined up.
That's a cool idea - and it would work in the stock game. Have you tried it?
